command.program:
check_samplesheet.py \
        samplesheet.csv \
        samplesheet.valid.csv

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_TAXPROFILER:TAXPROFILER:INPUT_CHECK:SAMPLESHEET_CHECK":
        python: $(python --version | sed 's/Python //g')
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir bowtie2
    bowtie2-build  --threads 1 genome.fasta bowtie2/genome
    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_TAXPROFILER:TAXPROFILER:SHORTREAD_HOSTREMOVAL:BOWTIE2_BUILD":
        bowtie2: $(echo $(bowtie2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*bowtie2-align-s version //; s/ .*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

minimap2 \
        -t 1 \
        -d genome.mmi \
        -x map-ont \
        genome.fasta

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_TAXPROFILER:TAXPROFILER:LONGREAD_HOSTREMOVAL:MINIMAP2_INDEX":
        minimap2: $(minimap2 --version 2>&1)
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir output

    ## Ensures --strip-components only applied when top level of tar contents is a directory
    ## If just files or multiple directories, place all in output
    if [[ $(tar -tzf testdb-bracken.tar.gz | grep -o -P "^.*?\/" | uniq | wc -l) -eq 1 ]]; then
        tar \
            -C output --strip-components 1 \
            -xzvf \
             \
            testdb-bracken.tar.gz \
            
    else
        tar \
            -C output \
            -xzvf \
             \
            testdb-bracken.tar.gz \
            
    fi

    mv output testdb-bracken

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_TAXPROFILER:TAXPROFILER:DB_CHECK:UNTAR":
        untar: $(echo $(tar --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*(GNU tar) //; s/ Copyright.*$//')
    END_VERSIONS

mkdir output

    END_VERSIONS

printf "%s %s\n" ERR3201952.fastq.gz ERR3201952_ERR3201952_raw.gz | while read old_name new_name; do
        [ -f "${new_name}" ] || ln -s $old_name $new_name
    done
    fastqc --quiet --threads 1 ERR3201952_ERR3201952_raw.gz

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_TAXPROFILER:TAXPROFILER:FASTQC":
        fastqc: $( fastqc --version | sed -e "s/FastQC v//g" )
    END_VERSIONS

## To ensure ID matches rest of pipeline based on meta.id rather than input file name
    
    [[ -f ERR3201952_ERR3201952.fastq.gz   ]] || ln -s ERR3201952.fastq.gz ERR3201952_ERR3201952.fastq.gz

    porechop \
        -i ERR3201952_ERR3201952.fastq.gz \
        -t 1 \
         \
        -o ERR3201952_ERR3201952_porechopped.fastq.gz \
        > ERR3201952_ERR3201952.log

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_TAXPROFILER:TAXPROFILER:LONGREAD_PREPROCESSING:PORECHOP_PORECHOP":
        porechop: $( porechop --version )
    END_VERSIONS

kraken2 \
        --db testdb-bracken \
        --threads 1 \
        --report 2611_se_db1.bracken.kraken2.report.txt \
        --gzip-compressed \
        --unclassified-out 2611_se_db1.bracken.unclassified.fastq \
        --classified-out 2611_se_db1.bracken.classified.fastq \
         \
         \
         \
        ERX5474930_ERR5766174_1.fa.gz

    pigz -p 1 *.fastq

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_TAXPROFILER:TAXPROFILER:PROFILING:KRAKEN2_KRAKEN2":
        kraken2: $(echo $(kraken2 --version 2>&1) | sed 's/^.*Kraken version //; s/ .*$//')
        pigz: $( pigz --version 2>&1 | sed 's/pigz //g' )
    END_VERSIONS

DB=`find -L ./ -name "*.dmnd" | sed 's/\.dmnd$//'`

    diamond \
        blastx \
        --threads 1 \
        --db $DB \
        --query ERX5474930_ERR5766174_1.fa.gz \
        --outfmt 102  \
         \
        --out 2611_se_db1.diamond.tsv \
        --log

    mv diamond.log 2611_se_db1.diamond.log

    cat <<-END_VERSIONS > versions.yml
    "NFCORE_TAXPROFILER:TAXPROFILER:PROFILING:DIAMOND_BLASTX":
        diamond: $(diamond --version 2>&1 | tail -n 1 | sed 's/^diamond version //')
    END_VERSIONS
